items.title: D-Mart: Margin miss in Q3; announces leadership change plan
items.description: While D-Mart is pursuing a healthy network expansion strategy, it faces increasing challenges from rapid market share gains by quick commerce players. Also, stratgey/execution plan of the new CEO is key monitorable

items.title: Air India plans more premium seats, eyes higher connecting traffic to tap 'huge growth opportunities'
items.description: Tata Group, which has been steering the loss-making Air India since January 2022, has consolidated its airline business and Air India Group’s revenues have jumped around 10 times to nearly USD 10 billion now compared to less than USD 1 billion in FY20

items.title: Italy’s steelmaker gets offers from Baku Steel, Jindal, Bedrock
items.description: Italy’s Industry Minister Adolfo Urso said the interest 'confirms we are on the right track to relaunch' Italy’s steel sector. 'This is the decisive phase,'

items.title: Neville Noronha to step down as Avenue Supermarts MD-CEO, Unilever's Anshul Asawa to take over
items.description: The company also said that Neville will support Anshul for a smooth transition over the next year as the latter joins the company in March, 2025

items.title: HUL incorporates new subsidiary Kwality Wall’s for ice cream biz
items.description: The board of HUL decided to de-merge the ice cream business, based on the recommendation of the Independent Committee, which was formed by the FMCG major earlier in September 2024

items.title: India alleges Diageo, Sequoia Capital made suspicious payments to influence decisions
items.description: The CBI said Diageo suffered a huge loss from the 2005 embargo on its products by the India Tourism Development Corp, a firm majority-owned by the government that had a monopoly on sales of imported duty-free liquor.

items.title: Subsidies, PLIs are detrimental to long-term growth of cleantech: Piyush Goyal
items.description: Goyal said reliable power would increasingly become a necessity with data centres coming up globally. Meanwhile, G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant said India must radically shift towards cutting-edge technology to become 'atmanirbhar' and curb imports.

items.title: Adani raises Rs 4,850 crore from sale of 13.5% stake in Adani Wilmar
items.description: AEL had earlier raised USD 500 million in October 2024, by way of qualified institutional placement route

items.title: Rajiv Bajaj weighs in on the 90-hour work week debate, says 'let it start from the top'
items.description: Rajiv Bajaj added that while companies needed to get the necessary job done, work hours were not the most defining factor holding back businesses.

items.title: Is it time for a relook at low corporate tax rates?
items.description: A sharp cut in corporate tax rates in 2019 has led to significant benefits for earnings, but this was to also drive private investments up, which has not happened

items.title: Vedanta seeks $450 million to repay top-performing junk bonds
items.description: First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC, Barclays Plc, Mashreqbank PSC and Standard Chartered Plc are among the lenders in discussion with the borrower to provide the loan

items.title: Tata Capital eyes first dollar bond amid India shadow bank rush
items.description: The financial services unit of the Tata Group, the conglomerate spanning industries from coffee to cars, is planning to issue a benchmark-sized note with a 3.5-year maturity

items.title: Sona BLW taps IIT Hyderabad to step up on drones and eVTOL plans
items.description: The company has in the past talked about the need to expand beyond the automotive sector to broader mobility areas to achieve a longer term growth ambition.

items.title: IPO pipeline for 2025 looks staggering, get ready for another record year
items.description: The level of retail interest IPOs too was very encouraging in 2024, with 66 out of 91 IPOs of 2024 getting more than 10 times subscription, and 10 IPOs were oversubscribed more than three times, said Prime Database.

items.title: TCS Q3 FY25 – Seasonality bites, but the commentary is reassuring
items.description: Operating margin improved sequentially, order inflows were strong and commentary encouraging

items.title: Business news January 10 Highlights: Adani Wilmar OFS to non-retail investors fully subscribed
items.description: GST Portal News Live: Taxpayers seek deadline extension after GSTR-1 filing suffers tech glitch - Check details

items.title: CAMS' insurance repository crosses one crore e-policies, 90% insurers offering digital option
items.description: CAMSRep said it is further investing in digital insurance, and has built Bima Central - first-ever platform for policyholders – for its eIA holders.

items.title: Adani Wilmar's OFS for 20% stake opens January 10, floor price Rs 275 per share
items.description: The OFS will have a base offer of 13.5% equity and a green shoe option for another 6.5% stake, a company filing said on January 9.

items.title: Explained: UB's suspension of beer supply in Telangana and consequences
items.description: The Telangana government has refused to raise beer prices despite demands from beer manufacturers. In December 2024, Chief Minister Revanth Reddy rejected the request for a price increase of at least Rs 10 per bottle.

items.title: Religare open offer: MP High Court disposes off investor petition against RBI, Sebi; AGM can now be conducted
items.description: The Burmans have already secured approvals from the Competition Commission of India (CCI), the Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI), stock exchanges, RBI and Sebi for the open offer.

items.title: Axis Bank – Can the stock reverse underperformance?
items.description: Stagnating earnings possibilities for H2FY25 limit meaningful short-term upside

items.title: Biden to further limit Nvidia AI chip exports in final push
items.description: The US wants to curb the sale of AI chips used in data centers on both a country and company basis, with the goal of concentrating AI development in friendly nations and getting businesses around the world to align with American standards, according to people familiar with the matter.

items.title: Sebi approves four IPOs including Dr Agarwal's Health, two DRHPs withdrawn
items.description: Dr Agarwal's Health Care, Casagrand Premier, Highway Infrastructure and Regreen-Excel EPC have received markets regulator Sebi's go ahead to raise funds through an IPO. In Sebi's parlance, observation letters implies the regulator's approval for public issue.

items.title: RBI removes supervisory curbs on Asirvad and DMI Finance
items.description: RBI said in a statement that it is satisfied with the companies’ submissions over their revamped processes, and commitment to adhere to regulatory guidelines on an ongoing basis.

items.title: Microsoft, Digital India plan AI centres in Tier II and III cities to train 5 lakh people
items.description: The project also promises to set up 'AI Productivity Labs' in 20 skill institutes across 10 states to train 20,000 educators, and will offer foundational AI courses to 1 lakh students in 200 Industrial Training Institutes (ITIs).
